title: Star Guardian Icon
body: Been longer than a few days since I took the Star Guardian Quiz but still no icon. I've seen Riot say to wait 72hrs but pretty sure I'm going past that by now. Suggestions?

replies.body:
It can take *up to a week* for the icon to be delivered to your account. If you don't see anything after then, let me know please!

Let me know if you have any other questions.
About 2 1/2 hours till a full week since I took the quiz and just now got it. For those waiting, keep your hopes up until the last minute! It'll get there~
